## Client.attach() method

`attach` attaches the given document to this client. It tells the server that this client will synchronize the given document.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
attach(doc: Observable<unknown>, isManualSync?: boolean): Promise<Observable<unknown>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  doc | Observable&lt;unknown&gt; |  |
|  isManualSync | boolean |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Observable&lt;unknown&gt;&gt;
